column4: Why isn't ubuntu automatically mounting my USB stick? It's there on /dev/sdb, but normally it automatically puts it on the desktop... etc?
i believe you need to add an entry to your /etc/fstab ....... but i'm sure someone will correct me if i'm wrong..

no you don't normally put removable media in the fstab. i figured it out.. I wan't running gdm, which does that stuff. I had the wrong headers so my x session didn't start and I started it w/ startx instead of GDM :)
glad to know u have it sorted
